original_text:
Like a lion he has left his lair,
    for their land has become a waste
because of the sword of the oppressor,
    and because of his fierce anger.”
korean_text: 그가 젊은 사자 같이 그 굴에서 나오셨으니 그 호통치시는 분의 분노와 그의 극렬한 진노로 말미암아 그들의 땅이 폐허가 되리로다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Like a lion he has left his lair,
for their land has become a waste
because of the sword of the oppressor,
and because of his fierce anger.”
